channel.title: Vanguard - new server, 24/7, multiword, friendly staff
channel.description:
VANGUARD A new survival server running Multiverse and McMMO! We currently have a survival, creative and war world. The server utilises a large selection of plugins that enhance gameplay, security and fun.
FEATURES Multiworld: survival, creative and war! Leveling and ability system for players and pet wolves. Rollback and block logging plugins. Self-service area protection using PreciousStones. A creative world based on a 'un-greifable' plot-system. An upcoming feature - War world. A huge battleground fit for large teams where there are no limits. Lag-free! 64-Slot! PLUGINS AutoAnnouncer ChatManager CoreProtect Craftipedia Essentials Lockette MasterPromote MobDisguise Multiverse (core, portals, inventories) MyWolf NoCheatPlus PermissionsEx PlotMe PreciousStones SignShop SimpleJail TreeAssist VanishNoPacket War WorldBorder WorldEdit WorldGuard McMMO Server IP - 176.31.145.44 Webiste - vanguardmc.enjin.com

@jclark3123 wrote:

VANGUARD
A new survival server running Multiverse and McMMO! We currently have a survival, creative and war world. The server utilises a large selection of plugins that enhance gameplay, security and fun.

FEATURES
Multiworld: survival, creative and war!
Leveling and ability system for players and pet wolves.
Rollback and block logging plugins.
Self-service area protection using PreciousStones.
A creative world based on a ‘un-greifable’ plot-system.
An upcoming feature - War world. A huge battleground fit for large teams where there are no limits.
Lag-free!
64-Slot!
